name: June
headline: June is the new way to do product analytics
description:
June is a plug & play product analytics for B2B SaaS. 

It automatically generates graphs of the metrics you should track, lets you view your company-level metrics, and zoom into them!

founders.name: Enzo Avigo, Founder
founders.description:
Product guy with a strong entrepreneurial mind-set.
Building something new üìä üëâ https://bit.ly/3fIr7KE

founders.name: Ferruccio Balestreri, Founder
founders.description:
I used to be an engineer at Intercom , where I met Enzo, my cofounder

Before that I built the tech side of altacucina.co the biggest community of Italian food lovers

In my free time I like to write here: https://ferrucc.io

# A dashboard for each of your customers
## Product analytics designed to help you retain more customers.
[Get started![Arrow](http://june.so/right-arrow-circle.svg)](http://june.so/<https:/analytics.june.so/start>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%271200%27%20height=%27728%27/%3e)![Company Page](http://june.so/_next/image?url=%2Fcompany-page%2Fhero-asset.png&w=3840&q=75)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27200%27%20height=%27200%27/%3e)![Auto generated arrow](http://june.so/company-page/auto-generated-arrow.svg)
## Trusted by the fastest growing SaaS companies
![Attio Logo](http://june.so/logos-q3/attio.svg)
![Causal Logo](http://june.so/logos-q3/causal.svg)
![Humaans Logo](http://june.so/logos-q3/humaans.svg)
![Knack Logo](http://june.so/logos-q3/knack.svg)

![Stravito Logo](http://june.so/logos-q3/stravito.svg)
![Tacto Logo](http://june.so/logos-q3/tacto.svg)
![Vessl Logo](http://june.so/logos-q3/vessl.svg)
![Xano Logo](http://june.so/logos-q3/xano.svg)
## Don't let a $50k churn catch you by surprise
Monitor your customers and find out who needs help
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%271192%27%20height=%27708%27/%3e)![Table](http://june.so)
## Improve your customer retention in 3 steps
Don't reinvent the wheel. Adopt proven retention strategies from the industry.
Analyse
### Find what leads to happy customers
Use analytics to find out what makes customers stick around and retain
![Find what leads to happy customers](http://june.so/home/use-case/analytics.png)
Compute
### Define a customer health score
Start measuring the health of your customers based on their activity and engagement
![Define a customer health score](http://june.so/home/use-case/health-score.png)
Take action
### Stay on top of churn
Stop getting surprised by churn. Plan ahead and act before it's too late.
Integrated with
![Hubspot](http://june.so/2024-q4/hubspot.svg)![Attio](http://june.so/2024-q4/attio.svg)![Salesforce](http://june.so/2024-q4/salesforce.svg)
![Stay on top of churn](http://june.so/home/use-case/monitor.png)
## How to get started
### Already have a tool in place?
Set up June in 2 mins. Don't believe us? Here is a [2 minute video](http://june.so/<https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=SKFrb4KPbEE>) showing it. Connect Segment, Amplitude, Mixpanel, or implement one of our SDKs.
![Avatar](http://june.so/home/get-started/avatar1.svg)![Avatar](http://june.so/home/get-started/avatar2.svg)![Avatar](http://june.so/home/get-started/avatar3.svg)![SOC II](http://june.so/home/get-started/soc.svg)![GDPR](http://june.so/home/get-started/gdpr.svg)
![Avatar](http://june.so/home/get-started/avatar1.svg)![Avatar](http://june.so/home/get-started/avatar2.svg)![Avatar](http://june.so/home/get-started/avatar3.svg)
### Is June your first product analytics tool?
Set up June with our easy to add snippet. It takes [less than 30 minutes](http://june.so/<https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=SKFrb4KPbEE>) and we give your engineer everything they need to get started quickly and [securely](http://june.so/</security>).
We can provide both a SOC 2 report and can help you make sure you are GDPR compliant.

# Customer analytics software for B2B SaaS
June is a Product & Customer Analytics Software, designed to seamlessly integrate product analytics with customer success strategies. Our platform provides a 360-degree view of user behaviour, from the initial activation to ongoing engagement, allowing you to pinpoint where users thrive and where they drop off. With real-time insights into key customer analytics metrics such as activation rates, feature adoption, and engagement patterns, you can proactively identify and mitigate churn risks. When integrated with your own CRM system, June equips your customer success and sales teams with the tools they need to build personalised retention strategies, ensuring that users remain loyal and invested in your product. They will be able to identify [upsell and account expansion opportunities](http://june.so/<https:/www.june.so/guides/upsell>), [convert free trials into paying customers](http://june.so/<https:/www.june.so/guides/how-to-convert-free-trials-onboard-customers-with-june-hubspot>), effortlessly manage [SaaS renewals processes](http://june.so/<https:/www.june.so/guides/renewals>) and [predict and prevent users churn](http://june.so/<https:/www.june.so/guides/churn-prediction-and-prevention>). By leveraging our comprehensive analytics and customer success capabilities and [content resources](http://june.so/<https:/www.june.so/blog>), you'll not only enhance user satisfaction but also drive long-term growth and maximise customer lifetime value.
![Blog](http://june.so/content/changelog.svg)

# Customer analytics software for B2B SaaS
June is a Product & Customer Analytics Software, designed to seamlessly integrate product analytics with customer success strategies. Our platform provides a 360-degree view of user behaviour, from the initial activation to ongoing engagement, allowing you to pinpoint where users thrive and where they drop off. With real-time insights into key customer analytics metrics such as activation rates, feature adoption, and engagement patterns, you can proactively identify and mitigate churn risks. When integrated with your own CRM system, June equips your customer success and sales teams with the tools they need to build personalised retention strategies, ensuring that users remain loyal and invested in your product. They will be able to identify upsell and account expansion opportunities‚ü®93‚ü©, convert free trials into paying customers‚ü®94‚ü©, effortlessly manage SaaS renewals processes‚ü®95‚ü© and predict and prevent users churn‚ü®96‚ü©. By leveraging our comprehensive analytics and customer success capabilities and content resources‚ü®97‚ü©, you'll not only enhance user satisfaction but also drive long-term growth and maximise customer lifetime value.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: June**

Founded in 2020 and part of the Y Combinator Batch W21, June is revolutionizing the way companies approach product analytics, especially within the B2B SaaS space. Based in San Francisco, June operates with a small yet agile team of six employees and is spearheaded by Group Partner Gustaf Alstromer.

**Mission Statement**

The core mission of June is simple yet profound: to be the new way to do product analytics. It aims to make analytics accessible and actionable for businesses, enabling them to understand and optimize customer behavior effectively.

**Product Features**

June is a plug-and-play product analytics software designed to do all the heavy lifting for you. It automatically generates relevant graphs that capture the metrics businesses should be monitoring. Users can view their overall company metrics and drill down for detailed insights, which is essential for understanding user behavior from initial activation through ongoing engagement.

The platform provides real-time insights into key metrics such as activation rates and feature adoption, while also helping to identify customer engagement patterns that could signal churn risks. By integrating seamlessly with existing systems like HubSpot and Salesforce, June empowers customer success and sales teams to build personalized strategies aimed at improving user retention and satisfaction.

**Why Choose June?**

- **Simplicity:** June is designed to be set up quickly‚Äîwithin minutes if you already have an analytics tool in place. This is a game changer for teams that need actionable insights without a frustrating configuration process.
  
- **Comprehensive Dashboard:** Users get a customized dashboard tailored to each customer's needs, enabling effective monitoring of product usage and identifying upsell opportunities.

- **Real-Time Analytics:** With live tracking and analysis, businesses can proactively respond to changes in customer behavior, helping to reduce churn and foster loyalty.

- **User-Friendly:** The platform is accessible, requiring no prior analytics expertise to navigate or derive value‚Äîeveryone on the team can leverage June's capabilities effectively.

**Client Base and Feedback**

June is trusted by fast-growing SaaS companies, showcasing a range of satisfied customers who appreciate the practical insights and ease of use. Users have noted how June allows them to identify upsell opportunities quickly, enhance their engagement with customers, and monitor crucial lifecycle metrics.

**Conclusion**

In a world where data-driven decision-making is paramount, June provides an invaluable solution for B2B SaaS companies looking to optimize their product analytics and customer success strategies. With its intuitive software and emphasis on customer retention, June is poised to play a significant role in how companies navigate their growth trajectories.

For more information, visit [June's official website](http://june.so).
